translations: v．铺草皮；赶走，驱逐（turf的过去式和过去分词）
园丁给草坪铺上了草皮。

phrs.translation: ◎以赛马为业；赛马场上的赌客

sentences.sentence: He was turfed out of the party.
The boys were turfed off the bus.
sentences.translation: 男孩们被赶下了公共汽车。

sentences.sentence: The bartenders turfed him out of the bar when he started making a disturbance.
sentences.translation: 当他开始在酒吧闹起来时，侍者将他撵走了。
